thread.title: (CAN-QC-Val-D’Or) Maintenance Technician(s) - Mining Equipment
thread.title_full: (CAN-QC-Val-D’Or) Maintenance Technician(s) - Mining Equipment

posts.title: (CAN-QC-Val-D’Or) Maintenance Technician(s) - Mining Equipment
posts.text:
Sandvik, Inc. Maintenance Technician(s) - Mining Equipment in Val-D’Or , Quebec 
Maintenance Technician(s) - Mining Equipment 
Sandvik Mining & Rock Technology is seeking 
Maintenance Technicians (2) 
Location: Agnico Eagle, Meliadine Mine site, Nunavut 
Schedule: Fly-in / Fly-out, based on two (2) week rotations 
Sandvik Mining & Rock Technology is a business area within the Sandvik Group and a leading global supplier of equipment and tools, service and technical solutions for the mining and construction industry including rock drilling, rock cutting, rock crushing, loading and hauling and materials handling. 
Located at Meliadine Mine in Nunavut, the Maintenance Technicians are responsible for troubleshooting, repairing and the maintenance of mechanical aspects of mining equipment and components according to defined specifications. 
Travel to the mine site is provided by a charter plane that departs from Val-d’Or and Montreal Quebec. 
Key Responsibilities include: 
Following scope of work, within time constraints, to meet cost, utilization and availability targets 
Inspecting equipment for proper performance and determining faults/malfunctions 
Adjusting equipment and repairing/replacing defective parts components or systems 
Testing repaired equipment to ensure proper operational performance 
Completing accurate time records, technical reports, failure reports and parts lists 
Other duties as assigned 
Technical certification or diploma in mechanical field 
Red Seal trade certification is preferred 
5+ years’ experience with mining equipment 
Written/oral communication in English is required 
Previous experience with Sandvik equipment is considered an asset 
Computer literacy (MS Office) 
Demonstrated ability to diagnose, troubleshoot and repair electrical and mechanical issues with mining equipment 
Excellent proficiency in reading hydraulic and electrical schematics 
Ability to travel to and from remote work sites 
Ability to work varied shift schedules 
Willingness and ability to work underground 
Willingness to complete pre-employment fit for duty medical testing and/or security clearance checks in accordance with Agnico Eagle Meliadine pre-site access requirements 
Must be legally eligible to work in Canada 
Benefits 
Sandvik offers a comprehensive compensation package including a retirement savings plan with matching, competitive health, dental, life and disability benefits, ongoing development and training. 
How to Apply 
Qualified candidates can apply at www.sandvik.com/careers to the Maintenance Technician job opening #355860. We thank all applicants for their response, however, only those being considered for an interview will be contacted. 
Sandvik is committed to fostering an inclusive, equitable, and accessible environment where all employees and customers feel valued, respected, and supported. We are dedicated to building a workforce that reflects the diversity of the communities in which we live and serve, and where every worker has the opportunity to reach their full potential. 
Deadline: 27 Nov

thread.title: Канте признался, что после травмы он, выходя на поле, испытывает страх
thread.title_full: Канте признался, что после травмы он, выходя на поле, испытывает страх

posts.title: Канте признался, что после травмы он, выходя на поле, испытывает страх
posts.text:
Англия Франция Канте признался, что после травмы он, выходя на поле, испытывает страх 
Полузащитник " Челси " Н'Голо Канте признался, что ему нужно время, чтобы он обрел уверенность в себе после полученной травмы . Ранее хавбек пропустил шесть матчей из-за повреждения задней поверхности бедра, которую он получил в составе сборной Франции. Возвращение Канте состоялось в домашней встрече " Челси " с " Манчестер Юнайтед " (1:0) в чемпионате Англии. 

"Мне нужно больше уверенности в себе , после таких травм выходя на поле ты испытываешь некоторый страх. Но после недели тренировок и первой игры я чувствую себя лучше. Я был долгое время я вне игры, работая с медицинским штабом и сейчас я благодарен всем за поддержку. 

Я рад вернуться и помочь одержать победу. Ты испытываешь стресс, когда не можешь играть и было странно быть вне игры и смотреть за этим со стороны", — цитирует Канте Evening Standard.

thread.section_title: Diritti Umani - Human Rights
thread.title: Appello per la libertà Liu Xia, moglie dell'attivista diritti umani Liu Xiaobo, detenuta senza nessun crimine
thread.title_full: Appello per la libertà Liu Xia, moglie dell'attivista diritti umani Liu Xiaobo, detenuta senza nessun crimine

posts.author: noreply@blogger.com (Ezio Savasta)
posts.title: Appello per la libertà Liu Xia, moglie dell'attivista diritti umani Liu Xiaobo, detenuta senza nessun crimine
posts.text:
Gariwo 
Una lettera per far rilasciare Liu Via - 50 scrittori internazionali chiedono la sua libertà 
Liu Xia Liu Xia, poetessa, pittrice e fotografa cinese, moglie di Liu Xiaobo - attivista Premio Nobel per la Pace deceduto lo scorso 13 luglio dopo anni di detenzione a seguito della sua lotta per i diritti umani - anche dopo la morte del marito continua a essere costretta a vivere sotto arresto senza aver compiuto nessun crimine. L’ultima volta che è stata vista in pubblico è stato per partecipare alla cerimonia funebre di Liu. 
Non è chiaro dove Liu Xia stia attualmente vivendo, probabilmente a casa di un amico a Pechino; le autorità cinesi sostengono che la donna sia in stato di piena libertà, ma sembrerebbe invece che sia isolata e controllata. In un video di poco più di un minuto postato su Youtube a fine agosto, Liu Xia dichiara “concedete al mio cuore il tempo di piangere e un giorno, quando la mia salute sarà migliorata, sarò in grado di affrontarvi di nuovo”. L’agenzia di stampa britannica Reuters tuttavia non è stata in grado di verificare dove si trovasse al momento del filmato e se la dichiarazione fosse o meno una sua libera scelta. Quello che è certo è che la donna vive in una condizione di salute difficile e di profonda depressione, lontano dai propri cari, tanto da avere paura - come lei stessa ha affermato - che il governo cinese usi il suo stato come pretesto per dichiararla insana di mente. 

Questa infelice situazione ha spinto oltre 50 scrittori di fama internazionale a indirizzare una lettera al Presidente cinese Xi Jinping - appellandosi alla sua coscienza - nella quale si chiede il rilascio della moglie del dissidente: un gesto forte e di grande commozione. Nella lettera aperta redatta da PEN America - rivista letteraria annuale in difesa della libera espressione pubblicata dal PEN American Center di New York - il gruppo di intellettuali chiede il rilascio di Liu Xia in nome non solo della Dichiarazione Universale dei Diritti Umani firmata dalla Cina, ma anche della stessa costituzione cinese che prevede libertà di parola e altri diritti affini.

“Liu Xia vive una profonda sofferenza da molti anni solo per il fatto di essere la moglie di un uomo che la Cina ha considerato un dissidente, in una situazione di detenzione in isolamento de facto - senza contatti col mondo senza poter decidere liberamente con chi parlare, dove viaggiare”.

Gli autori aggiungono inoltre che la loro richiesta di rilascio si unisce alle voci della U.N High Commissioner of Human Rights, della Norvegian Nobel Committee, del Segretario di Stato statunitense Rex Tillerson e dell’Ambasciata Tedesca in Cina.

thread.title_full: ابتکار: تضعیف جایگاه زنان از تهدیدهای جدی جهان امروز است

posts.title: ابتکار: تضعیف جایگاه زنان از تهدیدهای جدی جهان امروز است
posts.text:
بزرگنمایی متن خبر ابتکار: تضعیف جایگاه زنان از تهدیدهای جدی جهان امروز است معاون رییس جمهور در امور زنان و خانواده گفت: تخریب و آلودگی محیط زیست و نیز تضعیف جایگاه و نقش اجتماعی زنان از تهدیدهای جدی جهان امروز است و راه حل مقابله با این روندها که همه جهان را تهدید می کند، راه‌حل‌هایی است که در سرشت و تفکر و اندیشه انسانها برای حل و فصل مناقشات و پرهیز از زیاده خواهی‌ها و سلطه طلبی‌ها و برای جلوگیری از خشونت و افراطی گری نهاده شده است. 
به گزارش ایسنا، دکتر معصومه ابتکار رییس مرکز صلح و محیط زیست، روز دوشنبه در همایش بین المللی نقش زنان و خانواده در ایجاد صلح و مقابله با اثرات جنگ بر محیط زیست، همزمان با ششم نوامبر روز جهانی مقابله با اثرات جنگ با محیط زیست با ابراز خوشحالی و تشکر از اینکه همایش مقابله با آثار جنگ بر محیط زیست با همکاری سازمانهای مردم نهاد، تشکلها و علاقمندان موضوع صلح و محیط زیست و نیز نهادهای بین المللی مثل سازمان ملل متحد برگزار می شود، گفت: جلسه امروز از این بابت که در شرایط فعلی جهان که جنگ، خشونت و تروریسم هر روز بیشتر به جایگاه زنان و نیز محیط زیست آسیب می زند، اهمیت مضاعف دارد و موضوعات صلح و محیط زیست و نقش اجتماعی زنان و خانواده را بهم پیوند می زند. 
معاون رییس جمهور در امور زنان و خانواده اظهار کرد: خوشبختانه جمهوری اسلامی ایران چه در بخش دولتی و چه در بخش غیر رسمی، از زمان ریاست جمهوری آقای خاتمی با طرح ایده گفتگوی تمدنها و چه در دولت آقای روحانی که برنامه جهان در برابر خشونت و افراطی گری (WAVE) در سازمان ملل متحد مطرح شد، و نیز با توافق بزرگ برجام که پیشرفت مهم بین المللی در جهت حل و فصل مناقشات با گفتگو و رسیدن به راه حل منطقی بود، همواره در این عرصه پیشتاز و پیشگام بوده است. 
ابتکار تصریح کرد: برخلاف تلاشی که انجام می شود تا دولت و ملت ایران را به عنوان خشونت طلب و جنگ طلب جلوه دهند، ملت ایران برای دفاع از حقوق، عزت و استقلال خودش ایستادگی کرده و همین مکانی که در آن حضور داریم، یعنی موزه دفاع مقدس، نمادی از مظلومیت ملت ایران و دفاع و مقاومت جانانه او در برابر هجمه علیه این کشور و ملت است. 
وی خاطرنشان کرد: امروز زنان می توانند نقش بسیار مهم و تاثیرگذاری در عرصه ایجاد و حفظ صلح و مقابله با خشونت و درگیری ها در سطح بین المللی داشته باشند و امیدارم بتوانیم پیرامون اهمیت این نقش در نشست امروز مباحث مفیدی داشته باشیم و به نتایج و راهکارها و سیاستهای عملیاتی دست پیدا کنیم.

В Саратове началась продажа льготных проездных на декабрь Сегодня в 12:13, просмотров: 207 
В Саратове с сегодняшнего дня началась продажа льготных проездных на декабрь. В министерстве социального развития региона сообщают, что в городе открыты 108 пунктов продаж.

thread.title: VIXX ST★RLIGHT 별넷 팬미팅 #VNL (VIXX NIGHT LIVE)
thread.title_full: VIXX ST★RLIGHT 별넷 팬미팅 #VNL (VIXX NIGHT LIVE) : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: 팬더
posts.title: VIXX ST★RLIGHT 별넷 팬미팅 #VNL (VIXX NIGHT LIVE)
posts.text:
전부터 제발 팬미팅 더울 때 하지않았음 좋겠다고 그랬는데
딱 선선해지기 전인 10월! 개2득 엄청 좋았다!
그리고 작년 팬미팅때 진짜 너무 재미있었어서 더 기대 기대!
사실 팬미팅 콘서트 항상 다 재미있었지만!
고등학교 대학교에 이어서 이번엔 에센엘 컨셉! 여윽시 컨셉돌 b
솔직히 이거 보자마자 든 생각 하나
아 3분 남친 백퍼 한다!
​
아니나 다를까 굿즈부터 3분 남친 시리즈 실화냐구요~
밤새신 분들만 굿즈 사신 것 같았다..
사실 뱃지 사고 싶었는데 뱃지 ㅎㅅㅎ.. 그래 내가 가기 전에 매진ㅎㅅㅎ..
나는 맨날 당일 좀 천천히 가서 굿즈가 다 남아있는 걸 본 적이 없어 엉엉
지난번에는 슬로건 사려고 줄 서있었는데 앞에분이 3장 사셔서 매진 허허..
하! 여! 튼!
진짜 스탠딩 다시는 못 가겠어서 기를쓰고 좌석 했는데 좀 뒷쪽이지만
정면이라서 VCR도 잘 보이고 완전 좋았다규
​
그리고 들어가기 전 이거 나눠준다고 갑자기 트위터에 올라와서
허억 이게 뭐야 완전 기대했는데 좌석에 앉아있는데 넘 더워서 저걸로 부채질 겁나했다..
이번에는 내가 나눔하느라 나눔 거의 못 받으러 다녀서 아쉽다ㅠ_ㅠ
예쁜거 대왕 많았었는데ㅠㅠㅠ!
​
나랑 동생은 좀 천천히 들어가려고 사람 거의 없을때까지 밖에 돌아다녔다
​
5시 시작이었는데 4시까지 돌아다니면서 구경하고 사진찍고!
​
그 시간 되니까 이거 사진 찍는 사람 거의 없어서 한산하게 찍었다
​
​
진짜 웃겼던거는 동생이 15구역 16열이었고 나는 14구역 16열이었다
​
옆구역 같은 줄이라서 진짜 웃겼었다
​
진짜 보고 나와서도 백설.기공주, 천사소녀 레티, 켄데렐라, 정랍, 콩사, 곰돌이푸에횩
​
다 진짜 아직도 눈에 선하고 아직 팬미팅의 흥에서 헤어나오지 못 하고 있는 1인..
​
빨간 맛 극한직업 하드캐리 오로나빅씨는 1일 1영상 아니냐구여~
​
극한직업 매니져 진짜 웃겼다곸
욕을 그렇게 찰지고 웃기게 하는 사람 처음 봄
진짜 빨간 맛, 극한직업, 오로나빅씨, 하드캐리 대박이었다
나 저거 보고나서 오로나민씨 엄청 사먹는다구여...
​
팬미팅 끝나고 오로나민씨 판매량 늘었으면 그게 다 빅스때문~!
​
진짜 VCR 제발 풀어줬음.. 제발요..
​
하여튼 진짜 꿀잼이었다 팬미팅 끝난지 벌써 3주가 되어가는데
​
아직 팬미팅에서 헤어나오지 못 해서 현생 불가능 한 사람 바로 나..
​
분명 이건 백일몽 DVD 오면 팬미팅에서 콘서트로 넘어갈 삘이다
​ ​
 이제 백일몽DVD 오기를 기다려야지 허허
​
사진 출처는 : https://twitter.com/realvixx 여기
​
내가 보려고 남기는 NG영상 : https://youtu.be/dD9FrvIdXFA

thread.title: Υπέροχα ψητά αυγά με τυρί και κρεμμύδια
thread.title_full: Υπέροχα ψητά αυγά με τυρί και κρεμμύδια

posts.author: Frapedoypoli Blogspot (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Υπέροχα ψητά αυγά με τυρί και κρεμμύδια
posts.text:
Μια απολαυστική συνταγή με ψητά αυγά, τυρί και κρεμμύδια για ένα πλούσιο θρεπτικό πρωινό ή ακόμα και ως κανονικό γεύμα.

Συστατικά: 

3 κουταλιές της σούπας βούτυρο
2 μεγάλα κρεμμύδια, λεπτοκομμένα
1/4 της κούπας λιαστές ντομάτες ψιλοκομμένες
1 κούπα τριμμένη φρυγανιά
3/4 cup τριμμένο τυρί της επιλογής σας (ένταμ ή κεφαλοτύρι)
3/4 κούπα τριμμένη παρμεζάνα
6-7 αυγά, ανάλογα με το μέγεθος του τηγανιού

Οδηγίες: 

Προθερμάνετε το φούρνο στους 200 βαθμούς Κελσίου. Σε ένα τηγάνι που είναι ασφαλές να μπει σε φούρνο, ζεστάνετε το βούτυρο. Προσθέστε τα κρεμμύδια και τσιγαρίστε τα σε μέτρια φωτιά μέχρι να μαλακώσουν και να γίνουν ημιδιάφανα. Προσθέστε τις λιαστές ντομάτες.

Σε ένα μέτριο μπολ αναμείξτε τη φρυγανιά και τα τυριά. Ρίξτε το μισό μείγμα πάνω από τα κρεμμύδια. Με τη βοήθεια μιας κουτάλας κάντε μερικά κενά και σπάστε τα αυγά πάνω από τα κενά. Ρίξτε το υπόλοιπο μείγμα πάνω από τα αυγά. Βάλτε το τηγάνι στο φούρνο και ψήστε για 15-20 λεπτά, μέχρι η κορυφή να πάρει χρώμα, αλλά τα αυγά να είναι μελάτα.



Καλή σας όρεξη! 

Πηγή: http://ift.tt/2camdcI

thread.title_full: Consiliul Judetean este pregatit de iarna / O ninsoare timpurie nu va genera haos pe drumurile judetene

posts.author: Info Braila
posts.title: Consiliul Judetean este pregatit de iarna / O ninsoare timpurie nu va genera haos pe drumurile judetene
posts.text: Consiliul Judetean este pregatit de iarna / O ninsoare timpurie nu va genera haos pe drumurile judetene Share This chiriac CJ dj zapada Recent, intr-o conferinta de presa, presedinte Consiliului Judetean, Francisk Chiriac, a vorbit despre campania de deszapezire din aceasta iarna. Acesta a spus ca inca nu a avut discutii cu reprezentantii societatii care a castigat licitatia, dar acest lucra se va intampla in cursul acestei saptamani. Chiriac a subliniat faptul ca acest contract intra in vigoare de la 15 noiembrie, deci in caz de o ninsoare timpurie, in acest final de toamna, Consiliul Judetean este pregatit. Mai mult, seful judetului a adaugat ca in acest an vegetatie de pe marginea carosabilului a fost taiata, situatie in care nu se vor mai forma muntii de zapada de 2-3 metri din anii trecuti. “Pana in prezent nu am avut nicio discutie cu societatea care a castigat licitatia. Contractul intra in vigoare incepand cu 15 noiembrie. Saptamana viitoare(n.r. saptamana aceasta) o sa-i chemam aici sa avem o discutie. Au experienta, am lucrat cu ei si pe vechiul contract pe acord cadru. Deci ne cunoaste, stim cum lucreaza. Lucrul cel mai important este ca stim unde sunt punctele nevralnice. Un alt lucru bun e ca am reusit, in aceasta toamna, si mai avem pana la mijlocul lunii noiembrie acest contract pe cositul ierbii. Speram ca prin aceasta achizitie a cositului ierbii sa ne coste mai putin deszapezirea pentru ca nu o sa mai fie in toate zonele unde erau arbustii foarte inalti, sa se puna zapada. Anul trecut din cauza vegetatiei zapada avea si 2-3 metri” , a spus Chiriac. Comentarii

posts.author: EP
posts.title: La presunta víctima del abuso sexual en 'GH' no lo denunciará
posts.text:
Última hora sobre el caso de presunto abuso sexual en Gran Hermano. Carlota, concursante de la presente edición que podría haber sido víctima de los hechos, no ha querido corroborar ni denunciar la posible agresión por parte de José María , su pareja en el reality, ante los agentes de la Guardia Civil, según han informado a Europa Press fuentes de la Comandancia de Madrid. Los hechos, denunciados ante el Cuerpo por Mediaset , tuvieron lugar en la madrugada de este sábado en la casa de Gran Hermano, situada en Guadalix de la Sierra. Dos concursantes de 24 años y que son pareja, José María López y Carlota Pérez, estaban metidos en la misma cama.
Según ha explicado en el cuartel de la Guardia Civil de Colmenar Viejo el director de Contenido del reality, tras una fiesta nocturna ambos se fueron a la cama y pudo haber un presunto delito de abuso. "La mujer se encontraba bastante bebida y el hombre se tapó a sí mismo y a la mujer con un edredón, no pudieron llegar a ver lo que sucedía con exactitud bajo el mismo", según la denuncia a la que ha tenido acceso El Confidencial.
Sin embargo, los responsables de Gran Hermano alegaron a los guardias civiles que "no podían constatar la agresión porque todo ocurrió debajo del edredón" y tampoco han entregado dichas imágenes a la Guardia Civil. Los agentes se han puesto en contacto con la joven, que no ha querido denunciar, y pronto tomarán manifestación a su novio, entre otros puntos de la investigación.
En un comunicado hecho público esta madrugada, el concurso ha indicado que tomo la decisión de expulsar el sábado a José María y "consideró oportuno" por una "conducta intolerable" y también que Carlota abandonase momentáneamente la casa.
Asimismo, han puntualizado que el único expulsado es José María mientras que han aconsejado a Carlota que permanezca fuera de la casa "siguiendo las directrices del equipo de psicólogos". "La puerta está abierta para ella, de manera que el jueves podría reincorporarse al concurso", señalan.

posts.text:
258 детей усыновили в Нижегородской области в текущем году Сегодня в 12:12, просмотров: 317 
За 10 месяцев текущего года в Нижегородской области усыновили 258 детей. Об этом сообщает ГУ ЗАГС региона. 
За указанный период в области появились на свет 29 193 ребенка, количество зарегистрированных браков составило 20 209 – это на 1 069 браков больше, чем в прошлом году.

thread.title: মিতু হত্যা: ৬ মাসের জামিন পেলেন মুছার ভাই সাকু
thread.title_full: মিতু হত্যা: ৬ মাসের জামিন পেলেন মুছার ভাই সাকু

posts.title: মিতু হত্যা: ৬ মাসের জামিন পেলেন মুছার ভাই সাকু
posts.text:
মিতু হত্যা: ৬ মাসের জামিন পেলেন মুছার ভাই সাকু নিজস্ব প্রতিবেদক,   15:13:33.0   15:20:28.0 BdST সাবেক পুলিশ কর্মকর্তা বাবুল আক্তারের স্ত্রী মাহমুদা আক্তার মিতু হত্যার ঘটনায় মূল পরিকল্পনাকারী হিসেবে সন্দেহভাজন কামরুল ইসলাম শিকদার ওরফে মুছার ভাই সাইদুল ইসলাম শিকদার ওরফে সাকুকে ছয় মাসের অন্তর্বর্তী জামিন দিয়েছে হাই কোর্ট। Related Stories 
মিতু হত্যা কেন, উত্তর মেলেনি এক বছরেও 
তার পক্ষে জামিনের আবেদনের শুনানি শেষে বিচারপতি এম ইনায়েতুর রহিম ও বিচারপতি সহিদুল করিমের হাই কোর্ট বেঞ্চ মঙ্গলবার রুলসহ এ আদেশ দেয়। 
আদালতে আসামির পক্ষে শুনানি করেন আইনজীবী কুমার দেবুল দে; রাষ্ট্রপক্ষে ছিলেন সহকারী অ্যাটর্নি জেনারেল ইউসুফ মাহমুদ মোর্শেদ। 
দেবুল দে পরে বিডিনিউজ টোয়েন্টিফোর ডটকমকে বলেন, সাইদুলকে ছয় মাসের অন্তবর্তী জামিন দেওয়ার পাশাপাশি কেন তাকে স্থায়ী জমিন দেওয়া হবে না সে বিষয়ে রুল জারি করে রাষ্ট্রপক্ষকে চার সপ্তাহের মধ্যে জবাব দিতে বলেছে। 
“মামলার এজাহারে সাইদুল ইসলাম শিকদারের নাম নেই। তাছাড়া যারা স্বীকারোক্তিমূলক জবানবন্দি দিয়েছে তারাও ঘটনার সঙ্গে জড়িত হিসেবে তার নাম বলেননি।” 
গত বছরের ৫ জুন সকালে ছেলেকে স্কুল বাসে তুলে দিতে গতবছর ৫ জুন সকালে চট্টগ্রামের ও আর নিজাম রোডের বাসা থেকে কয়েকশ গজ দূরে জিইসি মোড়ে গিয়েছিলেন মিতু। মোটরসাইকেলে করে আসা কয়েকজন সেখানে ছেলের সামনে তাকে প্রথমে ছুরি মারে ও পরে গুলি করে হত্যা করে। মাহমুদা আক্তার মিতু চট্টগ্রামে জঙ্গি দমন অভিযানের জন্য আলোচিত বাবুল আক্তার চট্টগ্রাম নগর গোয়েন্দা পুলিশের অতিরিক্ত উপ-কমিশনারের দায়িত্ব থেকে পদোন্নতি পেয়ে পুলিশ সদর দপ্তরে যোগ দেওয়ার কয়েক দিনের মাথায় এ ঘটনা ঘটে।
এঘটনায় নগরীর পাঁচলাইশ থানায় অজ্ঞাতপরিচয় আসামিদের বিরুদ্ধে মামলা করেন বাবুল আক্তার। চট্টগ্রামে জঙ্গিবিরোধী অভিযানে বাবুল আক্তারের সম্পৃক্ততাও মিতু হত্যাকাণ্ডের সম্ভাব্য কারণ হতে পারে ধরে নিয়ে তদন্ত শুরু করে পুলিশ। তবে অল্প দিনেই সে ধারণা থেকে সরে আসেন তদন্তকারীরা। তবে নানা ঘটনাক্রমে বাবুলকে পুলিশের চাকরি ছেড়ে দিতে হয়। 
গতবছর ২৬ জুন মো. আনোয়ার ও মো. মোতালেব মিয়া ওরফে ওয়াসিম নামে দুইজনকে গ্রেপ্তারের কথা পুলিশের পক্ষ থেকে জানানো হয়। 
পরে বলা হয়, আদালতে দেওয়া জবানবন্দিতে তারা হত্যাকাণ্ডের মূল ‘পরিকল্পনাকারী’ হিসেবে কামরুল ইসলাম শিকদার ওরফে মুছার নাম বলেছেন। আর হত্যায় ব্যবহৃত অস্ত্রটি সরবরাহ করেন বাবুল আক্তারের সোর্স হিসেবে পরিচিত নগরীর বাকলিয়া এলাকার এহেতেশামুল হক ভোলার। 
রাঙ্গুনিয়া উপজেলার ছাত্রলীগ নেতা রাশেদ হত্যাসহ প্রায় ছয় মামলার আসামি মুছা ছিলেন চট্টগ্রাম নগর পুলিশের অতিরিক্ত উপ-কমিশনার বাবুল আক্তারের সোর্স। ভোলাকেও স্থানীয় অনেকে বাবুলের সোর্স হিসেবে জানতেন। 
পুলিশের ভাষ্য, মুছা এবং তার দুই সহযোগী নবী ও কালু হত্যাকাণ্ডে সরাসরি অংশ নেয়। এর মধ্যে নবী ও কালু ছুরিকাঘাত করেন বলে জবানবন্দিতে ওয়াসিম জানিয়েছেন। 
পরে বাকলিয়া এলাকা থেকে ভোলা ও তার সহযোগী মনিরকে পয়েন্ট ৩২ বোরের একটি পিস্তলসহ গ্রেপ্তার করে পুলিশ। উদ্ধার করা পিস্তলটিই মিতু হত্যাকাণ্ডে ব্যবহৃত হয় বলে পুলিশের ভাষ্য। 
ওই ঘটনায় পুলিশের পক্ষ থেকে ভোলা ও মনিরকে আসামি করে অস্ত্র আইনে একটি মামলা করা হয়। মিতু হত্যা মামলায় গ্রেপ্তার দেখানো হয় ভোলাকেও। 
ভোলা ও মনিরকে আসামি করে পুলিশ আদালতে অভিযোগপত্র দেওয়ার পর গতবছর ২২ নভেম্বর আদালতে এই অস্ত্র মামলার বিচার শুরু হয়। 
ভোলা ছাড়াও হত্যাকাণ্ডে ব্যবহৃত মোটর সাইকেলের ‘সরবরাহকারী’ মুছার ভাই সাইদুল আলম শিকদার ওরফে সাকু ও মো. শাহজাহানকেও গ্রেপ্তার করে পুলিশ। আর নুরুল ইসলাম রাশেদ ও নুরুন্নবী গতবছর ৫ জুলাই পুলিশের সঙ্গে কথিত বন্দুকযুদ্ধে নিহত হন। 
পুলিশের পক্ষ থেকে মুছাকে গ্রেপ্তারের চেষ্টার কথা বলা হলেও তার পরিবারের দাবি, হত্যাকাণ্ডের ১৭ দিনের মাথায় মুছাকে বন্দর থানা এলাকায় এক আত্মীয়র বাসা থেকে পুলিশ নিয়ে গেছে। 
মুছার স্ত্রী পান্না আক্তার গতবছর ৪ জুলাই সংবাদ সম্মেলন করে দাবি করেন, ২২ জুন বন্দর থানার তৎকালীন ওসি মহিউদ্দিন সেলিমের নেতৃত্বে পুলিশের একটি দল মুছাকে গ্রেপ্তার করেন। 
তবে পুলিশ বরাবরই এ দাবি নাকচ করে আসছে। মুছা ও তার সহযোগী কালুর সন্ধান পেতে পাঁচ লাখ টাকা পুরস্কারও ঘোষণা করেছেন চট্টগ্রামের পুলিশ কমিশনার ইকবাল বাহার। বিজ্ঞাপন

thread.section_title: TradeTrade
thread.title: 酒匂隆雄が語る「畢生の遊楽三昧」第113回 - 酒匂隆雄の畢生の遊楽三昧
thread.title_full: 酒匂隆雄が語る「畢生の遊楽三昧」第113回 - 酒匂隆雄の畢生の遊楽三昧

posts.author: hashimoto
posts.title: 酒匂隆雄が語る「畢生の遊楽三昧」第113回 - 酒匂隆雄の畢生の遊楽三昧
posts.text: 国内外の銀行で為替ディーラーとして活躍され、その華麗な取引手腕から「貴公子」と称された酒匂隆雄さん。為替ディーラーの第一人者の顔とは別に、レーシング、海外旅行、ワイン・グルメに温泉旅行と、様々な趣味をお持ちで、人生を楽しく過ごすことに関しても一流人です。 このコンテンツでは、楽しい話題や日々の生活、たまには為替マーケットについて語っていただきます。 10月31日はハロウィーンで、子供達が色々な格好をして「Trick or treat」（お菓子をくれないと悪戯しちゃうぞ）と言いながらご近所を回ってお菓子をおねだりする可愛いお祭りである。 我が家の孫達も、男の子はゲームのキャラクターのスプラトゥーンとやらの格好をし、女の子はカボチャの帽子を被り、同じくカボチャのスカートを穿いて黒いマントを羽織り、実に可愛い物であった。 子供達は可愛い！まあこの程度の仮装であれば大体何をやっても許される。『子供達は』である。 もし皆さんの中で似た様な事をおやりに成った方がいらっしゃれば申し訳ないが、大の大人が滑稽で奇抜な格好をして大騒ぎするのは本当に腹立たしい。渋谷の交差点で徒党を組んで交通を妨げたり、電車で奇声を上げて騒ぐのは、もう此れは犯罪と一緒だと思う。 ハロウィーン狂騒曲と呼んでもいいな。 Weblio辞書によると狂騒曲とは、『クラシック音楽で自由形式の曲を指す「狂想曲」にかけて、社会的な大騒ぎ、騒乱・狂乱といった意味で用いられる表現』とある。そう、騒乱・狂乱である。 昔は日本ではハロウィーンなんかで大騒ぎしなかった。誰かが紹介しておっちょこちょいの日本人とお調子者の外国人が乗って狂騒曲となった。実はスケールは違うがクリスマスやバレンタインデーなども同じだと思う。

thread.title_full: ندوة بعنوان ” المشروعات القومية الكبري والتنمية المستدامة ” بغرب الاسكندرية

posts.author: SIS4westAlex
posts.title: ندوة بعنوان ” المشروعات القومية الكبري والتنمية المستدامة ” بغرب الاسكندرية
posts.text: في اطار حملة ” بإيدينا نبني بلدنا ” بهدف التعريف بدور المشروعات القومية في دعم الاقتصاد المصري ودفع عجلة التنمية بمصر نظم مركز اعلام غرب الاسكندرية ندوة بعنوان ” المشروعات القومية الكبري والتنمية المستدامة ” بمدرسة ممدوح سالم الثانوية بنات، وادار الندوة اماني محمد مسئول الاعلام التنموي، وافتتح الندوة مجدي الغريب مدير المركز حيث أوضح أهمية المشروعات القومية الكبري في دفع عجلة التنمية لتنال مصر ما تستحقه من مكانة اقتصادية وسياسية ، وحاضر بالندوة د/ ايهاب عبد الخالق بالمعهد العالي للخدمة الاجتماعية حيث عرف المشروعات القومية الكبري بانها كيان قانوني تشرف عليه الدولة لا يستهدف الربح قد يقدم سلع او خدمات ، وان التنمية هي جهد مجتمعي يستهدف تغيير مقصود في الجوانب الاجتماعية من خلال بناء قدرات الانسان بالتعليم واكتساب الخبرات وجوانب اقتصادية من خلال تخطيط مجتمعي لاستثمار موارد الدولة اكبر استثمار ممكن ، واضاف د/ ايهاب ان المشروعات القومية الكبري هي اساس تحقيق التنمية المستدامة لتحقيق المصلحة العامة وحفظ حق الاجيال القادمة، ثم عرض عدد من المشروعات القومية الكبري التي اطلقتها الدولة وهي مشروع قناة السويس الجديدة وشبكة الطرق الجديدة ،وايضا البدء في إنشاء مشروع المركز اللوجستي العالمي للحبوب والغلال والسلع الغذائية بدمياط و مشروع استصلاح مليون ونصف فدان وانشاء العاصمة الادارية الجديدة وانشاء محطات توليد الكهرباء بتكلفة 10 مليار جنيه وايضا مشروع تنمية سيناء مما سيكون له اثر كبير في زيادة معدل التنمية في مصر.

posts.author: 조선광택 평택본점
posts.title: 안중광택/SM7 페인트 날림 리무버... 작업후 광택으로 표면복원과 유리막코팅으로 맑고 투명하게
posts.text:
광택/PPF/디테일링 안중광택/SM7 페인트 날림 리무버... 작업후 광택으로 표면복원과 유리막코팅으로 맑고 투명하게 2시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/k75082411/221134664781 안녕하십니까.. "조선광택 평택본점"입니다.
저희 조선광택 메인업무는 광택, 유리막코팅, PPF, 디테일링, 언더코팅이며
평택본점은 청북과 안중사이 서평택IC근처 외진곳에 위치해 있습니다.
.
.
조선광택은 전북 전주점, 경기도 부천점, 서울 강동구 길동점, 전북 군산점에도
위치해 있으니 많은 관심 부탁드립니다..
.
.
.
이번 시공은 페인날림입니다. 육안으로는 뭐 조금 날렸겠니 하시겠지만
전처리 작업을 하면서 조명을 켜고 하나하나 만져 보면 그렇지만도 않습니다.
항상 눈으로 보는거에 몇배는 더 많은양에 페인트들이 있으며
페인트를 제거하는 과정에서 생겨나는 데미지들을 광택이란 시공을 통해 복원하기에
광택후 깨끗해진면에는 점하나 페인트까지 정확히 잘보이기에 페인트 제거 작업은
그리 쉬운작업만은 아닙니다.
.
.
.
광택 시공시 몇가지 당부드릴부분은
돌빵(스톤칩), 페인트 까지거. 패인거, 새똥이나 나무수액으로 인한 페인트 산화,
갈라짐등은 광택으로 안됩니다.
한가지 예를 들어 사진에 나와 있는 부분은 문콕 데미지 입니다.
광택이란 작업으로 어느정도 개선은 되겠지만 완벽히는 불가 합니다.
.
.
.
광택전처리 과정에서 항상 해드리는 부분이 엠블럼및 틈새 케어 작업입니다.
광택 시공이 끝난후 엠블럼 주변이나 틈새들이 정리가 안되면 퀄리티가 떨어져 보이기도 합니다.
.
.
마스킹후 초벌은 플렉스602+장모 조합입니다.
이번 광택은 가급적 면을 거칠게가 아닌 곱게 띄우며 초벌을 진행하였습니다.
상황에 따라 데미지를 만들며 작업하기도 하고요
면을 최대한 곱디곱게 띄우면서 작업할때도 있습니다.
차종과 도장면에 상태에따라 그때 그때 달라지고요
.
.
.
우리 길동이가 루프를 진행중입니다. 진진한 눈빛으로 폴리셔를 다루고 있습니다.
그동안 제게 욕먹어가며 잔소리 듣느라 수고했다.
.
아직은 무게가 제법인 602는 접어두고요 150으로 천천히 급하지 않게
초벌을 진행하고 있는중입니다.
.
.
.
휀다 각라인... 부분입니다. 어떻게 난 상처인지는 모르겠으나 제법 얇고 깊은 데미지입니다.
상처의 부위가 그런지라 가급적 한번에 빼내는 방법을 택했습니다.
.
위 사진과 비교하시면 아시겠지만 한번에 잡아낸후 입니다.
.
.
.
우리 길동이가 열심히 한판한판 정성을 들이고 있는 중입니다.
.
.
하이그로시 B필러 부분도 최대한 데미지를 잡아내고 있는 중이고요
.
.
.
딱 여기까지 그러닌까 전처리 그리고 마스킹 광택...
초벌... 중벌.... 마무리까지 1박2일 소요되었습니다.
1박2일동안 붙어있던 마스킹테이프는 제거하였구요
이제 후처리 과정이 남아있습니다.
컴파운드 제거와 유리막 코팅을 위한 탈지세정... 그리고 코팅입니다.
.
.
.
광택후 본넷트에 모습인데요 본연에 오염물들과 스크래치와 스월들로 인해 난반사로
보였던 도장면을 광택이란 과정을 통해 정반사로 바꾸어 맑고 투명하게 그리고 채도와
광도를 올리고 난후 입니다.
그렇습니다. 우리가 하는 광택이란 시공은 난반사를 정반사로 바꾸는 일입니다.
여기서 얼마나 좀더 디테일하게 그리고 얼마나 광도와 채도를 끌어 올리느냐에
따라 시공비가 달라지기도 합니다.
.
.
.
수북히 쌓인 컴파운드 가루... 돌가루를 제거하는 후처리 과정이 남았지만
바로 광택이란 시공이 끝난후가 가장 좋은 광도와 채도 보여주기에 몇장에
사진을 찍어보았습니다.
.
.
.
스팀을 이용해 틈새 컴파운드를 제거함과 동시에 찌든때와 틈새케어를 진행하는 중입니다.
.
.
.
역시 틈새제거도 우리 길동이가 출현해주었구요
.
.
.
유리막 코팅을 위한 탈지 세정작업중입니다.
.
.
.
충분히 맑고 투명하게 광도와 채도를 만들어드린 SM7 광택 그리고 유리막 코팅 시공이었습니다.
감사합니다.

posts.title: 공중밀집장소추행 실질적규명
posts.text:
공중밀집장소추행
​
​
​
용인시방면광역버스를타고가다가옆에앉아있던승객에게얘기를걸고팔부분에몸을기댔다는연유로공중밀집장소추행혐의로받은전례가있는데요피의자 P 씨는일부맞닿은것은사실이나형사처벌로이어지는것은과도하다항변하였죠
​
​
​
​ 한데검찰은이를받아들이지않았어요결초 1 심에서 200 만원의벌금과치료교육이수 40 시간을선고하였죠추행행위란타방의성적수치심을야기시키는소행으로써주관적인식에따라당해되는것이아니라선량한풍속을거슬러야한다는것이판결례의입장입니다
​
​
​
​
​
허나실제공중밀집장소추행과얽힌 先 례를보면비비거나쓰다듬은추행행각이아니라찰나에스쳤던면이화근이되기도했죠요즈음처럼한파가몰아쳐냉촉이촉발되는때에는인파틈에서방한장비를착용하거나벗는경로에서당면할여지도농후하지요
​
공중밀집장소추행의케이스는강제추행성립에요구되는위협은긴요치않는탓에폭넓은범주가준용돼난처한지경에놓일수있지요더구나착수시기의해석에따라미수가적용될수있어부적합한형태로경찰조서에직면해관두에서있을시엔속히합당한논증을마련할수있어야하죠
​
​
​
​
간혹이견을좁힐수없어황당무계하게피의자로지목돼수세에몰리는형국에처했음에도섣부른추단만으로핏대를세워이치에맞지않은어필과울분 鬱憤 만토로하는사태도있으나공중밀집장소추행의인과를해명코자한다면쓱훑어보거나지레짐작만으론사안을낱낱이파헤쳐적법하게입장을실증해관철시키긴까다롭지요
​
​
​
​
​
따라서공중밀집장소추행진상을규명해공명정대한판가름을받고현출된애로를타개하고자할땐논리가비약되지않은증거를모색해불거진현상을바로잡아야하죠 ! 이런소치로적시가흘러가기전초미에법리적견지를함양한변호인과동행해전격적으로결부된난제를조각해나가시기바랍니다
​
​
​

thread.title: Non le solite maglie da hockey
thread.title_full: Non le solite maglie da hockey - Il Post

posts.author: ilpost.it
posts.title: Non le solite maglie da hockey
posts.text:
La scorsa settimana Nike ha presentato le nuove divise delle dodici nazionali di hockey maschile (Stati Uniti, Canada, Svezia, Norvegia, Russia, Corea del Sud, Repubblica Ceca, Giappone, Slovenia, Slovacchia, Germania, Svizzera) che il prossimo febbraio prenderanno parte ai XXIII Giochi olimpici invernali di Pyeongchang, in Corea del Sud. Le maglie sono state realizzate riducendo il più possibile il volume dei materiali e dei dettagli, per garantire miglior vestibilità e maggior leggerezza agli atleti che le indosseranno: è una novità per l’hockey, le cui squadre finora sono state abituate a giocare con maglie ben più larghe e tutt’altro che minimali, con stemmi grandi posizionati sotto il petto.
Nike
La direzione creativa di Nike per le Olimpiadi invernali ha presentato le nuove maglie spiegando che la loro realizzazione è stata ispirata dal “sapere che quando gli atleti si sentono e si vestono bene, poi giocano bene”. Nike le ha prodotte usando nylon lavorato, un materiale più leggero e traspirante, mantenendo lo stesso modello per le dodici diversi federazioni; anche il font è comune, tranne che per Stati Uniti e Corea del Sud (la nazione ospitante), mentre gli stemmi sono di dimensione ridotta e circondati da un maggior numero di dettagli. Lo stile dello “swoosh” applicato sulle divise, inoltre, è ispirato alle lame dei pattini.

thread.title: U.S. department stores tap brakes on stocking for holiday season By Reuters
thread.title_full: U.S. department stores tap brakes on stocking for holiday season By Reuters

posts.title: U.S. department stores tap brakes on stocking for holiday season By Reuters
posts.text:
U.S. department stores tap brakes on stocking for holiday season Stock Markets 3 hours ago (Nov 07, 2017 01:10AM ET) This article has already been saved in your Saved Items © Reuters. FILE PHOTO: The entrance to a Macy's department store is seen in Austin 
By Nandita Bose 
CHICAGO (Reuters) - This holiday season, retailers are making a list, checking it twice, and then ordering less for U.S. shoppers. With foot traffic at their stores in decline, department stores that would have stocked up for the biggest shopping season of the year months ago are still in the process of placing new orders, according to nearly a dozen sources including company officials, vendors who work with the retailers and consultants who advise such chains. 
The strategy is aimed to keep their inventory costs down and avoid the experience of previous holiday seasons, when large piles of unsold stock led to deep markdowns that eroded profits. But these retailers risk losing sales if supplies run out at a time when many are struggling to keep up with Amazon.com Inc (O: AMZN ) and a steady shift towards online shopping. 
Macy's Inc (N: M ), J.C Penney Co Inc (N: JCP ) Kohl's Corp (N: KSS ) Nordstrom Inc (N: JWN ), Dillard's Inc (N: DDS ) and Hudson Bay Co’s (TO: HBC ) Lord & Taylor are among the retailers buying in smaller batches with shorter lead times this year and relying on a more dynamic demand forecasting process than in the past, according to sources familiar with these companies' practices. 
Macy's, Kohl's, Nordstrom, J.C. Penney declined to comment. Lord & Taylor said it is working on preparing a carefully selected merchandise assortment for the holiday season but did not share anything specific. Dillard's did not respond to a request for comment. 
Keeping inventory levels low helps manage costs, and may also instill urgency in consumers to spend now rather than hold off on purchases in search of a better deal, according to the sources. But it also risks alienating customers who may end up having less choice, and is also putting strain on vendors to deliver on shorter lead times, the sources added. 
The high-stakes strategy takes a page from the playbook of Inditex (MC: ITX ) SA-owned Zara, Hennes & Mauritz AB (H&M) (ST: HMb ) and other so-called "fast fashion" retailers that consistently keep low inventories of trendy clothes and try to win customers with cheap prices. 
For a graphic, click http://reut.rs/2lEBkkT 
"I think in some sections the choice is limited this year like cashmere sweaters and sweaters in general," said Dakota Whitlow, a 46 year old marketing executive as she shopped for winter clothing at Macy's State Street store in Chicago. 
"But limiting choice is in many ways better than overcrowding the store with clothes, which makes it harder to shop," she added. 
Traditionally, retailers lock in most of their purchases nine months to a year in advance. This year, retailers started placing a large portion of their holiday orders three to four months before the holiday season, and are refreshing fast-selling items within as little as six to eight weeks, vendors and consultants said. 
"There is a big push from department stores across the board this year to cut down lead times and manage inventory tightly," said Robert D'Loren, chairman and CEO of U.S.-based Xcel Brands, which supplies branded apparel to chains like Lord & Taylor and Dillard's and private label clothing to other department stores. 
"We are delivering orders on weekly cycles with plans that are six weeks out." 
The risk for department stores is whether suppliers can keep up with the new approach. 
Department stores rely on vendors whose traditional supply chains are not built for a fast turnaround, because they handle orders for several brands. Fast-fashion chains, on the other hand, have designed their supply chain to shift on a week to week basis versus the traditional four for department stores and work with vendors who can deliver quickly on private label items they stock. 
As a result, some smaller vendors of traditional department stores struggle to adapt to request for shorter lead times. 
"We are refusing to take (last-minute) orders. We just don't have that kind of idle capacity in our factories, our production lines. Cargo delivery contracts are not built to react that way," said a Bangladeshi supplier to J.C. Penney and Kohl's, who would only be quoted on condition of anonymity. 
WILLING TO LOSE A SALE 
So far this year, retailers have been willing to sacrifice some orders for tighter inventory management. 
"Between the risk of a lost sale and the risk of a loss of margin, department stores are willing to lose the sale this year," said Greg Portell, a consultant with AT Kearney who advises retail chains on strategy. 
Retailers are optimistic about their new strategy. Macy's expects a "marked difference this holiday versus last" in the way it buys stock, Chief Executive Jeff Gennette said on an earnings conference call in August. "We definitely are buying closer in... to make sure we have the right goods in time for holiday, but not too far in advance. 
To be sure, ordering closer to demand can help a retailer cope with weak consumer spending, but it cannot offset its negative impact altogether. 
While consumer confidence has improved overall, the National Retail Federation cautioned in October that U.S. consumers will remain hesitant to spend until there is more certainty about policy changes on issues such as taxes and trade. The trade group estimated holiday sales for the U.S. retail industry will grow between 3.7-4.2 percent in 2017, from 3.75 percent in 2016. 
"(Retailers) simply don't want to be stuck with excess stock. It takes up working capital and that was okay when times were good but not when things are this tough," said Neil Stern, partner at McMillan Doolittle, a consultancy who works with retailers including department stores. U.S. department stores tap brakes on stocking for holiday season

posts.text:
“검찰 망신주기식 수사” 문제 없나
공안통 선배, 공안부 후배가 조사, 공무수행 사건을 지나치게 압박, 과거 유사사건은 윗선에만 책임, 윤석열 지검장 ‘강성 수사’ 도마에
변창훈 서울고검 검사의 울산지검 공안부장 시절 모습.
변창훈 서울고검 검사의 사망으로 윤석열 서울중앙지검장과 국정원 사건 특별수사팀의 수사행태를 지적하는 비판이 검찰 안팎에서 나오고 있다. ‘공안통’인 변 검사를 공안부 평검사가 수사토록 하고, 업무수행 중 발생한 일에 대해 지나치게 압박해 검사로서의 마지막 자존심을 뭉갰다는 지적이다.
6일 검찰 등에 따르면 변 검사는 서울중앙지검 공안담당 3개 부서 가운데 말석부서인 공공형사수사부에서 주로 수사를 담당했다.
사법연수원 23기로 윤 지검장과 동기인 변 검사가 한참 후배인 검사들에게 조사를 받으면서 느낀 자괴감이 컸을 것으로 짐작된다.
수도권의 한 검찰 간부는 “대검 공안기획관 등 공안검사로서 요직을 거친 그를 공안부 평검사가 조사했다는 게 문제로 보여진다”며 “조사과정에서 거친 언사라도 있었다면 어땠겠는가”라고 지적했다.
뇌물사건이나 파렴치범 사건과 달리 공무수행 중 발생한 일이고, 변 검사가 수사기관 간부라는 특성을 간과한 것 아니냐는 비판도 제기된다.
부장검사 출신의 전직 공안검사는 2013년 검찰의 국정원 댓글 수사 당시 압수수색을 방해한 변 검사의 혐의에 대해 “ 국정원 파견 검사는 본인이 원해서 가는 자리도 아니고, 국정원이란 조직 자체가 위계질서가 명확해서 검찰 조직처럼 부당한 명령을 거부하기 어려운 상황이었을 것 ”이라고 지적했다.
불법이 있었다면 사법처리는 당연한 수순이지만, 최대한 명예를 지켜주는 수사가 이뤄졌어야 한다는 것이다.
실제로 과거 유사한 공안사건에선 피의자를 공개 소환하지 않았다. 주로 ‘윗선’이 책임을 지고 사법처리 됐다는 점도 이번 수사와 다른 점으로 지적됐다.
수사팀은 2013년 국정원 감찰실장이었던 장호중 검사장부터 파견검사였던 변 검사와 이제영 부장검사까지 관련자 대부분을 공개 소환하고, 사법처리 대상에도 포함해 무더기로 구속영장을 청구했다.
변 검사가 최근 스스로 목숨을 끊은 국정원 소속 정모 변호사와 여러 차례 통화했다는 이야기까지 나오면서 지나친 ‘망신주기’란 소리도 나왔다.
검찰 일각에선 신병확보를 미적대다 ‘타이밍’을 놓쳤다는 지적도 나온다. 변 검사는 지난달 28일 검찰 소환조사를 받은 뒤 이틀 뒤에 구속영장을 청구했고 이날 구속 전 피의자심문(영장심사)을 앞두고 있었다.
수사경험이 풍부한 검찰 고위간부는 “이 정도 인물을 공개 소환할 정도였으면 수사에 자신이 있었다는 것이므로 곧바로 신병을 확보했어야 했다”고 아쉬워했다.
검사가 검사에게 조사를 당하는 굴욕적인 상황을 감안해 소환조사 때 긴급체포 등의 방식도 고려했어야 한다는 것이다.
검찰 내부에선 화끈하지만 강성이란 평가를 받아온 윤석열 지검장의 수사지휘 스타일이 이번 사건과 무관치 않다는 지적도 나온다.
특수부장 출신의 전직 검찰 간부는 “수사목표 달성에 집착한 나머지, 검찰이 너무 앞만 보고 달려온 것은 아닌지 되짚어 봐야 할 시점 같다”고 말했다.
http://www.hankookilbo.com/v/bcd787dfcbb54eae8b8b5c32f3547283

posts.author: custodioluis (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Dívidas ocultas: Investigação americana pode resultar em detenções, diz José Machicane
posts.text: Dívidas ocultas: Investigação americana pode resultar em detenções, diz José Machicane Os investigadores querem saber se os bancos em causa “facilitaram a corrupção de funcionários moçambicanos,” disseram fontes ao Wall Street Journal. O jurista moçambicano José Machicane diz que se, nas investigações que a justiça norte-americana está a fazer aos três bancos internacionais envolvidos no caso das chamadas dívidas ocultas em Moçambique, ficar confirmado que houve corrupção, poderá haver penas de prisão. Ouça aqui: VOA-Dívidas oculta Investigação americana pode resultar em detenções diz José Machicane O Ministério de Justiça dos Estados Unidos e o FBI lançaram uma investigação sobre os dois mil milhões de dólares cedidos pelo credor suíço Credit Suisse Group, o banco russo VTB Group e o banco Francês Paribas SA. Os investigadores querem saber se os bancos em causa “facilitaram a corrupção de funcionários moçambicanos,” disseram fontes ao Wall Street Journal. O jurista José Machicane diz que isso não surpreende, dado o carácter internacional de toda a empreitada à volta dos dois mil milhões de dólares. Se for confirmado que houve corrupção na investigação aos bancos, as consequências serão graves, diz Machicane. Ele recorda que foi relatado que as autoridades do Reino Unido terão iniciado também uma investigação para compreender os contornos do caso. E noutras ocasiões, a justiça americana empreendeu acções de clarificação em relação à situações em que houvesse indícios criminais e que tivesse alguma ligação com fundos norte-americanos. Um dos casos recentes do género está relacionado com a Embraer, fabricante brasileiro de aviões. VOA – 06.11.2017 NOTA: Parece que o Relatório não serve para nada. Todos investigam menos a PGR. Fernando Gil

thread.title_full: ترخیص خودروهای بالای ۲۵۰۰ سی‌سی به کشور نداریم

posts.title: ترخیص خودروهای بالای ۲۵۰۰ سی‌سی به کشور نداریم
posts.text:
بزرگنمایی متن خبر ترخیص خودروهای بالای ۲۵۰۰ سی‌سی به کشور نداریم مدیرکل مرکز واردات و امور مناطق آزاد و ویژه اقتصادی : هیچ‌گونه ثبت سفارش و ترخیصی برای خودروهای بالای ۲۵۰۰ سی‌سی در گمرکات کشور نداریم. 
به گزارش میزان، علی معقولی در خصوص جزئیات ترخیص کالای کارخانجات بدون پرداخت حقوق ورودی بیان کرد: اقلامی که در تولید به کار می‌روند، مواد اولیه تولید و تمام مواردی که برای تولید به کشور وارد می‌شود مشمول این بخش‌نامه می‌شود. 
وی در توضیح سایر اقدامات گمرک در جهت رفع موانع تولید در کشور گفت: در راستای این قانون در خصوص کالای صادراتی واحدهای تولیدی تمهیداتی داریم که بحث شرکت‌هایی که دارای گواهی استاندارد دارند دیگر لزومی به ارائه نمونه استاندارد ندارند و اقسام کمک‌های ویژه را برای واحدهای تولیدی در نظر گرفته‌ایم. 
مدیرکل مرکز واردات و امور مناطق آزاد و ویژه اقتصادی تصریح کرد: در خصوص ورود مواد اولیه در بخش ترانزیت واحدهای داخلی و تضمین ترانزیت مبالغ کمتری از واحدها دریافت خواهد شد. 
معقولی با اشاره به استقبال تولید کنندگان از مکانیزم کمک به واحدهای تولید در زمینه ترخیص کالا اظهار کرد: در نظر سنجی‌های صورت گرفته در گمرکات کشور تولید کنندگان از این مکانیزم رضایت کامل را داشته‌اند. 
وی در خصوص سرعت ترخیص کالای دارویی یادآور شد: ترخیص کالای دارویی به دو روش عمده فرس و بدون فرس از طریق گمرکات هوایی و یا زمینی انجام می‌شود و در گمرکات کشور به صورت شبانه روزی مقوله ورودی داروها با حداقل تشریفات صورت می‌گیرد. 
مدیرکل مرکز واردات و امور مناطق آزاد و ویژه اقتصادی با اشاره به ممنوعیت واردات خودروهای بالای ۲۵۰۰ سی‌سی در گمرکات کشور گفت: هیچ‌گونه ثبت سفارش و ترخیصی برای خودروهای بالای ۲ هزار و ۵۰۰ سی‌سی در گمرکات کشور نداریم. 
وی در انتها خاطر نشان کرد: در مناطق آزاد نیز واردات و ثبت سفارش خودروهای بالای ۲۵۰۰ سی‌سی به صورت محدود و در خود این مناطق صورت می‌گیرد.

posts.author: KarmaNoMore
posts.text:
Pumpkin, my answers would be exactly the same. I don't understand how people of either sex can take so very little care of their appearance and then be complaining that the person they are with is loosing interest in their relationship, their friendship, whatever.
Making an effort to be clean and tidy is a sign of respect towards the person they are with also. How many of us have not been allowed to certain places or provided with rubbish service because the people we were with was looking like a homeless person.
It doesn't need to be the height if fashion, but if you do not like to be seen as romantically associated with a tramp, you will certainly not be happy of being seen around holding hands with someone that looks like one.

posts.text: 1 Tự nhiên ở đùi em xuất hiện những hiện tượng da bị mỏng đi. Hồi cách đây khoảng 3 4 tháng gì đó, phần đùi e xuất hiện một vết lằn nhỏ, em tưởng do đi xe máy ngồi nhiều nên bị. Nhưng không phải bây giờ ngày nó nó càng lan ra nhiều. mỗi vết lằn vậy nó dài cũng một ngón tay nó phân bố trên đùi cũng 5 6 vết như vậy. posts.author: websteven003 (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: 乾癬症狀多 容易被誤診
posts.text:
想瞭解最時尚、自然的Life Style？輕鬆成為新時代生活達人？【晨星生活元氣報】讓你輕鬆掌握最新生活訊息！ 房地產買賣不是一朝一夕的簡單課題，快訂閱【好宅生活家】幫助您了解房市脈動，打造快樂家庭！ ★ 無法正常瀏覽圖片，請按這裡看說明   ★ 無法正常瀏覽內容，請按這裡線上閱讀 新聞    健康    財經    追星    NBA台灣    udn部落格    udnTV    讀書吧    2017/11/07 第 669 期   |   訂閱/退訂   |   看歷史報份     本期主題 •乾癬症狀多 容易被誤診       乾癬症狀多 容易被誤診 文/黃筱珮   時序入秋，天氣乾冷，又到了乾癬易發作時節！全台逾10萬人受乾癬影響，其中不可逆的「乾癬性關節炎」，容易被誤認為「類風濕性關節炎」，影響工作及生活品質。 
41歲的張小姐16歲發病，為治療乾癬看遍中西醫，曾喝蛇湯、吃蛇粉……，因病情極度自卑，除制服外，從沒穿過裙子；懷孕5個多月時，因為不能吃藥，病情急速惡化到併發關節炎、虹彩炎，小孩出生後一度連下床泡牛奶都辦不到，瀕臨絕望。眼看著孩子逐漸長大，深怕乾癬影響親子關係，張小姐開始積極接受治療，現在身上超過95%的皮膚都已改善，重新穿上25年來從未穿過的裙子。 
什麼是乾癬？皮膚紅腫、脫屑嚴重 
台大醫院皮膚部主治醫師蔡呈芳表示，乾癬是常見的慢性免疫疾病，全球約有1億2千萬的乾癬患者，其中1/3屬中、重度乾癬，任何年齡都可能發作，但大多數的患者會在20∼30歲發病。 
由於患者皮膚的發炎反應，會導致皮膚細胞不正常增生，使得皮膚外觀紅腫、脫屑，有患者形容「像剝皮地獄」，但不會傳染他人。統計數據顯示，國內乾癬盛行率約千分之3，推估全台灣至少有11萬名乾癬病友，尚不包括未就醫或未確診的人數。 
乾癬的病因目前並不清楚，應與先天遺傳體質有關，受到後天內外環境刺激下，誘發免疫反應。而感染、外傷、健康食品（食補）、荷爾蒙、藥物、天氣變化或日曬、抽菸喝酒、情緒波動及壓力，都可能誘發乾癬。但這些因素受到個人遺傳體質及當時疾病活性強弱所影響。 
常侵犯四肢、頭皮、後腰際、股溝 
國內乾癬患者男多於女。蔡呈芳表示，患有乾癬的女性，通常是青春期、產後或更年期發作，可能與荷爾蒙變化有關；男生的荷爾蒙影響不顯著，25∼30歲發病多。 
典型的乾癬病灶特徵，為界限分明的紅斑塊上覆有銀白色鱗屑，所有皮膚部位都有可能被侵犯，四肢的外側、手肘、膝蓋、頭皮、後腰際、股溝是最常見的好發部位，5∼7成病人會覺得患部發癢。 
易合併關節炎，有心血管疾病風險 
值得注意的是，乾癬不是單純皮膚病，除了外顯的皮膚症狀，部分患者也合併關節炎，且因身體長期處於發炎狀態，患者比一般人易出現代謝症候群（如三高及肥胖），進而造成心血管疾病風險增加。 
當疾病控制不良，乾癬造成的心理衝擊更會引起憂鬱症。因此，選擇正確的治療方式，有助於使乾癬成為一個長期控制及照護的疾病。 
慎防誘發乾癬發作10因子 
基因是決定乾癬是否發作的主要原因，蔡呈芳表示，研究顯示，同卵雙胞胎有7成是兩人同時乾癬，顯示會遺傳。此外，環境和個體的行為因素也會影響病情的變化。誘發乾癬發作的因子可歸納如下： 
1 外傷：開刀傷口，磨擦、碰撞、摳抓……。 
2 氣候變化：尤其氣溫低更易好發。 
3 荷爾蒙：女性荷爾蒙變化大的幾個時期，例如產後、青春期、更年期。 
4 肥胖：肥胖被視為是體內慢性發炎的表現，可能誘發乾癬。 
5 感染：上呼道感染、扁桃腺發炎、鼻腔感染、牙周病、細菌、病毒等。 
6 藥物：精神科用藥鋰鹽、治療C型肝炎的干擾素、高血壓藥物和抗黴菌藥都易誘發。 
7 喝酒、抽菸。 
8 情緒壓力、睡眠障礙。 
9 部分健康食品：例如靈芝、巴西磨菇、牛樟芝，易讓發炎反應更強。 
10 長期缺乏維生素D。 
慢性免疫失調疾病，常見9大共病 
乾癬是免疫失調所致的身體多系統慢性發炎性疾病，蔡呈芳表示，一旦發作，幾乎是全身都在發炎，「共病」不少，包括乾癬性關節炎、心血管疾病、代謝症候群、乾癬性指甲、骨質疏鬆都有可能。 
1 乾癬性關節炎： 
約3成患者會導致乾癬性關節炎，關節疼痛、晨間僵硬、腫脹、喪失關節活動、功能性，嚴重影響生活品質。 
2 乾癬性指甲： 
指甲變黃、凹陷、指甲與甲床分離、指甲增厚易碎、敏感疼痛。 
3 心血管疾病： 
乾癬患者發生心臟病的風險比一般人高出32%，心肌梗塞罹病風險，更比一般人高出110%。而且越年輕，相對風險越高。 
4 代謝症侯群： 
約4成乾癬病人合併代謝症候群，乾癬患者罹患糖尿病風險高出64%、高血脂症風險高出61%。 
5 憂鬱症： 
因為外觀和全身性疾病的不適，乾癬病人容易憂鬱、低落。健保資料庫分析發現，患者憂鬱風險比一般人高出50%，睡眠障礙風險也高出289%。 
6 脂肪肝： 
乾癬病人患有脂肪肝的風險比一般人高出127%。 
7 骨質疏鬆症： 
乾癬是免疫系統失調疾病，全身免疫系統障礙可能攻擊骨頭及關節週圍的結締組織等，引發骨鬆。 
8 克隆氏症： 
一種發炎性腸道疾病，可侵犯消化道各部位，腸道發炎後出現充血、水腫、淋巴腫，進而潰瘍、結疤、纖維化，可能導致腸管狹窄，甚至瘻管膿瘍。不過乾癬與克隆氏症的關聯性，在台灣並未證實。 
9 虹彩炎： 
主要是急性前葡萄膜炎，是自體免疫性疾病，患者會有畏光、疼痛、紅腫、流淚、近距離視力模糊及視力降低的症狀。 
身心健康傷害不可小覷 
台北及林口長庚醫院皮膚科主治醫師黃毓惠也表示，研究已證實患者心血管疾病風險比一般人高，且乾癬患者罹患心血管病變有年輕化的趨勢。年輕族群的嚴重型乾癬患者發生心肌梗塞的風險，較一般人高出3倍。 
超過80%的乾癬患者因為症狀影響，連睡眠、工作都有困擾。研究指出，乾癬影響患者的心理程度，甚至與糖尿病、憂鬱症、癌症等重大疾病相近。 
黃毓惠指出，乾癬患者若忽視共病而不治療，會引發後續併發症，如高血壓或糖尿病，長期會影響腎功能，最終可能會洗腎，不可輕忽。 
乾癬性關節炎影響關節，易被當成類風濕性關節炎醫治 
臨床上，常見「乾癬性關節炎」被誤診為類風濕性關節炎，導致症狀惡化。黃毓惠表示，「乾癬性關節炎」特徵是會合併有指甲問題，也好發於「遠端指尖關節」，且容易整根手指會腫脹如同「香腸指」，和類風濕性關節炎不同。 
要注意的是，若是乾癬的皮膚症狀不明顯時，且關節炎特徵沒那麼明顯，就容易被誤認為類風濕性關節炎，宜仔細辨別。另外，乾癬性關節炎不只影響週邊關節，還有中軸關節，包括脊椎等部位也會受影響，因此很多患者會合併背痛，這是類風濕性關節炎不會有的。 
黃毓惠表示，當乾癬性關節炎進展快速時，關節很快就會被破壞變形，更需要積極治療，有些患者單只使用口服藥物，療效不佳，需要使用生物製劑，才能達到更好的療效。 
黃毓惠提醒，乾癬性關節炎的惡化因素，包括工作負重或過度使用關節，導致關節輕微受傷，會讓病情更嚴重，建議患者不要負重，盡量不要受傷，戒菸戒酒，同時要做關節復健。但有些患者可能因為關節痛不敢動，反而很容易僵硬，手指要注意多伸展，若有背痛也要勤伸展，有助於病情和緩。 
乾癬4大治療方法 
蔡呈芳、黃毓惠均表示，目前乾癬並無根治的方法，約1/3患者因病程自然痊癒，其餘約1/3患者病程反覆起伏，時好時壞，其他患者則必須持續治療，否則病灶會逐漸惡化。乾癬治療原則，是希望降低全身發炎反應，大致有以下幾種治療方式： 
1 口服藥物： 
有免疫抑制劑及表皮分化調節劑2種口服藥物。免疫抑制劑可利用控制免疫系統，改善因為免疫系統過度反應的乾癬病情。表皮分化調節劑則是減少皮膚異常增生及分化，對免疫影響小。不同口服藥物有不同的系統性風險，需要固定抽血追蹤。 
2 外用藥膏： 
成分多以維生素D為主，維生素A、類固醇、水楊酸、焦油等成分，也可調節皮膚的發炎情況，另外，中藥青黛也有學者研究報告其療效。外用藥物使用方便，但停藥容易復發。 
3 照光療法： 
有UVB紫外線治療和PUVA（Psoralen followed by UVA）紫外線治療2種，藉由照光降低細胞過度複製與分化，並降低皮膚發炎能力，進而改善乾癬。有些患者合併骨鬆，此療法同時可以強化骨質，缺點是皮膚會曬黑、老化，變乾燥。部分患者長期使用，可能有皮膚癌潛在風險，尤其是西方人。 
4 生物製劑： 
抗腫瘤壞死因子生物製劑可治療乾癬，一些研究也顯示可同時降低患者心血管疾病、心肌梗塞的風險。此類藥品雖無乾癬口服藥的肝、腎風險，但仍須注意感染症狀。 
避免乾癬發作，生活保健9原則 
1 控制體重。 
2 定期篩檢(量體重/量血壓/量腰圍/測血糖/測血脂)。 
3 減少壓力。 
4 拒絕菸酒。 
5 避免高糖、高油、高鹽飲食。 
6 避免進補、慎選健康食品：少吃羊肉爐、薑母鴨等補品；健康食品中的巴西蘑菇、螺旋藻、靈芝、牛樟芝、冬蟲夏草也可能增強免疫反應，讓病情加重。 
7 早睡早起，睡眠充足。 
8 別用太熱的水泡澡：有患者想藉著泡熱水澡或溫泉把皮屑去掉，卻因熱水帶走更多皮膚上的油脂，使得皮膚更癢，病情惡化。 
9 避免搔抓及外傷。

posts.text:
HUOLLON AMMATTILAINEN & TIIMIPELAAJA? HALUAMME KUULLA SINUSTA LISÄÄ 
Huoltoasentaja 
Sandvik Mining and Construction Finland Oy on kaivos- ja urakointiteollisuuden toimittaja. Tarjontaan kuuluvat korkealaatuiset laitteet, kattavat jälkimarkkinapalvelut ja tekniset ratkaisut mm. maanpäälliseen ja -alaiseen poraukseen, murskaukseen ja seulontaan, lastaukseen ja kuljettamiseen sekä kalliorakentamiseen. Myyntiyhtiö työllistää noin 100 henkeä, ja sillä on toimipisteet Vantaalla, Lohjalla, Nokialla, Kajaanissa ja Torniossa. Haemme nyt Lohjalle vahvasti asiakaslähtöistä huoltoalan osaajaa. 
Keskeiset tehtävät 
Työskentelet osaamisesi ja/tai koulutuksesi mukaisesti murskaus- ja seulontalaitteiden huoltotehtävissä. Haasteenasi on oppia tuntemaan tuotteemme ja olet valmis kehittymään monipuoliseksi asiantuntijaksi. Työ tapahtuu pääasiallisesti itsenäisesti asiakkaidemme luona Etelä-Suomen alueella. 
Odotamme sinulta 
Työkoneiden sähkö- ja automaatio-osaamista. Tehtävässä menestymisen kannalta on eduksi, jos tunnet väyläpohjaisia ohjausjärjestelmiä. Työtehtävät koostuvat pääsääntöisesti asennuksista, korjauksista ja vianhausta asiakaskohteissa tai Lohjan huoltopisteessämme. Sinulla on sähköalalle sopiva tekninen koulutus, ja jonkin verran eduksi katsottavaa alan työkokemusta. Olet yhteistyökykyinen, joustava, oma-aloitteinen, oppimishaluinen ja itsenäiseen työhön kykenevä. Tehtävän hoitaminen edellyttää matkustusvalmiutta, sujuvaa englannin kielitaitoa sekä voimassa olevaa ajokorttia. 
Tarjoamme sinulle mahdollisuuden kehittää omaa ammattitaitoasi sekä vaihtelevia, itsenäisiä ja mielenkiintoisia tehtäviä alan huipputuotteiden parissa sekä ammattitaitoisen tiimin tuen. 
Lisätietoja/yhteydenotot 
Jukka Makkonen, aluehuoltopäällikkö, p. 040 218 0560 ja sähköposti: jukka.makkonen@sandvik.com. 
Rekrytointiprosessia koskevissa kysymyksissä voit ottaa yhteyttä Sandvikin HR Palveluihin p. 0800 1 . 
Lähetä hakemuksesi ansioluetteloineen ja palkkatoivomuksineen 26.11.2017 mennessä. 
Lue lisää Sandvikista ja täytä hakemus osoitteessa www.sandvik.com/career. 
Työpaikan tunnus on 355850. 
Sandvik on kansainvälinen korkean teknologian teollisuuskonserni, jonka pitkälle kehitetyt tuotteet ovat markkinajohtajia valikoiduilla erikoisaloilla. Näitä ovat metallintyöstössä käytettävät työkalut, kaivos- ja rakennusteollisuuden laitteet ja työkalut, ruostumattomat materiaalit, erikoismetalliseokset, metalliset ja keraamiset kestomateriaalit sekä prosessijärjestelmät. Vuonna 2016 konserni työllisti 43 000 henkilöä, ja sillä oli työntekijöitä ja toimintaa yli 150 maassa. 
Deadline: 26 Nov

thread.section_title: Ayayo Gong
thread.title: IKORODU WITNESSES COLOURFUL DISPLAYS OF ASA AROKOLO CARNIVAL
thread.title_full: IKORODU WITNESSES COLOURFUL DISPLAYS OF ASA AROKOLO CARNIVAL

posts.author: Ayayo Gong (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: IKORODU WITNESSES COLOURFUL DISPLAYS OF ASA AROKOLO CARNIVAL
posts.text:
November 4, 2017 was a spectacular day in the entire Ikorodu division as hundreds of Asa display in different colours and dance in promoting the culture and traditions by various Asa groups from different towns held at Ferry Terminal Park, Ipakodo, Ikorodu, Lagos.

Governor Akinwunmi Ambode in his address delivered by the Special Adviser and Acting Commissioner of Tourism, Art and Culture, Hon. (Mrs.) Akinsola Adebimpe J.PIL, after unveiling the Asa statue affirmed that the Asa Arokolo carnival is going to be an annual festival that the State Government will start to be sponsoring and uphold from generation to generations.

"Asa Arokolo carnival has been registered as part of the programme of Lagos Cultural Festivals that will be celebrated yearly in the State. This decision is borne out of the desire towards fulfilling the electoral promises of Governor Ambode in promoting and placing Lagos State Art and culture in frontier force in Africa and the world at Large. 

Hon. Akinsola, who spoke after the well co-ordinated parade of the various Asa Groups belonging to different towns in Ikorodu division, said the State government is ready to showcased the beauty of Asa Arokolo festival to the world and presented a Certificate of Registration to certify the inclusion of Asa festival in Lagos State government gazette on historical properties and cultural heritages sites.

According to Hon. Sanai Oyeniran Bolanle Agunbiade, Majority Leader, Lagos State House of Assembly, Opomulero of Ikorodu Kingdom, and the scout master of IREP- Ikorodu Division Rebirth Foundation, he said, "the Asa Arokolo carnival is one of the foremost festivals which identify us as a people in Ikorodu division; it is part of our belief system and distinguishing emblems. Our culture is a summation of our beliefs and learned behaviours that must be jealously guarded and transmitted from the present to future generations".

In the same vein, HRM, Oba Kabir Adewale Shotobi, the Ayangburen of Ikorodu, he said, "Just as the way Eyo Adamu orisa is been celebrated in Lagos Island, Asa Arokolo will also be celebrated annually in the entire Ikorodu division, the festival is for both male and female, and indigenes and non-indigenes of the division which am happy as the Lagos State Governor, His Excellency, Mr. Akinwunmi Ambode for readiness in promoting the socio-cultural festival in Ikorodu division.

The Ayangburen said, "Asa Arokolo carnival is a festival and a socio-cultural heritage that is unique to the people of Ikorodu division where different cultures and traditions are abound" he concluded.

Also, HRM, Oba Abdulsemiu Kasali, the Adeboruwa of Igbogbo Kingdom, he said, "am very grateful and happy. As you can see that all the traditional rulers are here, we are happy with today's outing and pray it continues to gain more support amongst the communities that made up Ikorodu division. The festival is a cultural awakening which we want both investors and tourists to come and observed what we are doing and they will be able see the richness in our cultural and traditional heritages.

In an interview with HRM, Oba Richard Abayomi Ogunsanya, the Olubeshe of Ibeshe, he said, "special thanks to Hon. S.O.B Agunbiade for organizing and reviving Asa Arokolo cultural festival, by the special grace of Almighty God, this event is going to be celebrated yearly and is significance to the entire people of Ikorodu division cannot be overemphasized.

Sir (Otunba) Ayodele Elesho, the Agbakin of Ikorodu Kingdom and Former Commissioner for information in Lagos State, he said, "am joyous that this is happening in Ikorodu, this programme is a cultural revival, a cultural reorientation, a new dimension to our culture in Ikorodu division, we thank God for this and am particularly grateful to Hon. S.O.B Agunbiade because all what we are witnessing here today are single handedly sponsored by him. What a fantastic person, I pray God should continue to bless him so that he can continue to work for the good of Ikorodu division.

"Asa in the Yoruba etymology is a unique tradition that has is own special way which make it still relevance in our modern days societies. For instance, when he prays for a barren woman, such woman will conceive and have a baby, if he pray for person that has still birth, such individual will not experience it again, it usually pray for a prosperity of a community, and where ever you see Asa, children will be there to celebrate and rejoice and that is what the anniversary is all about" He added.

Sir David Sumoni, the vice president of Oriwu Club, Chairman of the occasion, representing Ikorodu Oriwu Club, he said, "The Asa Arokolo carnival is organized to showcase our culture in Ikorodu division to the world. While Eluku traditional festival cannot be displayed openly, Asa is one of the socio-cultural heritage that is open to everybody either young or old, male or female, indigenes and non-indigenes, it is all embracing and always attracted a lot of people and we can as well see this as opportunity for people to annexed the potential of tourism that we have in the entire Ikorodu division.

A large crowd of people made up of gaily dressed  from all walks of life thronged the venue to witness the Asa Arokolo carnival organized by IREP Foundation featuring Asa from Asa Ijomu Ikorodu, Asa aga Ikorodu, Asa Imota, Asa Agura, Asa Igbogbo, Asa Imowo nla, and Asa Isele alaro.

Also not left out of the fun filled day were sons and daughters in the division that turned out in a very large numbers in the uniquely designed Ankara fabrics.

thread.section_title: What’s on my agenda for #cipdACE17? – priyadotcom
thread.title: What’s on my agenda for #cipdACE17?
thread.title_full: What’s on my agenda for #cipdACE17?

posts.author: priyadotcom
posts.title: What’s on my agenda for #cipdACE17?
posts.text:
I’ve really struggled to pick which sessions I’d like to attend for this year’s #cipACE17, because they all look so bloody interesting (the struggle is real guys)!
I eventually managed to whittle it down to a few, and used my #cipdACE17 app to keep track of what I want to go to and where I need to be.
DAY 1:
The opening keynote for the CIPD’ s 70th Annual Conference with Baroness Martha Lane-Fox is a must. As a founder and executive chair of doteveryone.org.uk, a non-executive director for Twitter, co-founder of lastminute.com and a CBE, it’s fair to say that we’ll eagerly be listening to what Baroness Lane-Fox has to say about the digital revolution and it’s impact on the world of work. In a world where we rely on technology for almost everything, how we can develop digital understanding to millions of people who still do not have basic digital skills, and how can we ensure that the digital future can be a force for good for everyone?
Next on my list is [A2] From Annual Appraisals to Continuous Performance Management. So many of us come from working backgrounds where performance reviews are seen as a once-a-year-tick-box-exercise, but what message does that really send out to our workforce? “My manager only cares about my performance at a certain time of year” or “I’ll have to wait until my yearly review before I find out if my performance is up to scratch or not”. I’m looking forward to this conference session because we’ll get to hear how two organisations are trying to upskill line managers to continuously coach and develop their teams, and linking individual and team performance to business outcomes.
This ties in nicely with the next session of the day [B3] Equipping Line Managers with Coaching and Mediation Skills 
Workplace conflict and personality clashes are inevitable, no matter which organisation you work for, and more often that not (and most traditionally), managers will turn to HR as the ‘fixer’ to these problems. But this is where our role as HR professionals needs to steer in a different direction. This session will fill us in on how best we can help our line managers to transform from a directive to a supportive leadership style and restore productivity and efficiency within teams.
I’ll also be popping in to [C2] to understand how moving from transactional to strategic HR can add value to a business , which will definitely give me some food for thought as day 1 draws to a close!
DAY 2:
I think I’ll start my second day at #cipdACE17 by looking at [D2] Enhancing your brand and Value Proposition to attract the right talent. I feel like this is crucial now more than ever in this employee’s market that we live in. Attraction and retention are just 2 of the biggest challenges for employers at the moment, so it will be good to hear what insights Jon Dawson and Jane Graham have for us!
Something I’m focussing more in my own career development is cross-functioning in business i.e. HR working collaboratively with other functions such as Finance and Marketing for example. So it’s only right that I check out [E3] Connecting HR, Finance, Operations and Business Leaders to Achieve Success. 
And last but not least, the closing keynote with Professor Gernot Schulz I think will be a spectacular finale to two great days of the 70th Annual Conference and Exhibition! As we spend two days reflecting and building for the Future of Work, the closing keynote will use musical examples to demonstrate and address: the crucial role of leaders and the fine balance between guidance and autonomy; the conditions for seamless integration, collaboration and peak performance; the pitfalls of inadequate leadership and its effect on the final results, and the importance of leading through emotion, intuition and non-verbal communication.
One last thing, if you’re hanging around Manchester before and in between the two days, check out my blog on the CIPD’s social programme! 
See you soon!

Los famosos que se escaquean de pagar impuestos Isabel II. Keira Knightley, Madonna y la reina Isabel II son algunas de las celebridades que figuran en los 'Paradise Papers' ELENA DE LOS RÍOS/MUJERHOY Martes, 7 noviembre 2017, 07:48 
De nuevo, una alianza de periodistas y medios de comunicación de todo el mundo ha desencriptado y analizado una filtración (13,4 millones de documentos) de tipo financiero para contarnos lo que podíamos imaginarnos: que los megaricos mueven su fortuna a través de sociedades creadas en paraísos fiscales donde la tributación se reduce al mínimo. Hay nombres de primera fila de la política, como Justin Trudeau, primer ministro canadiense, o Jared Kushner, yerno de Donald Trump. Y también hay artistas y reinas. 
Tres de las más grandes estrellas del mundo del 'showbusiness' y del papel 'couché' figuran también en estos polémicos papeles: Madonna, Bono, el cantante de U2 y la reina Isabel II. ( Más información en Mujerhoy.com ) Temas
